title.$t:
To Billy McDonald:

Not around where I live and wo...

content.$t:
To Billy McDonald:

Not around where I live and work. Topics about Islam and Muslims rarely enter discussion as people around me know very little about these issues and prefer not to talk about them out of political correctness. I do have many friends who are Muslims and many of my mentors over the years have also been Muslims, and I see them drink alcohol and eat pork just like I do and so I think that maybe the threat of fundamentalist Islam is greatly exaggerated, at least where I live. Like I said above, I am ultra-liberal at heart, because I know that if the alt-right, white supremacists, neo-nazis and skin-heads got their way, none of us "coloreds" can remain in North America.
